What are the treatments for Multifocal Motor Neuropathy ?,"Treatment for multifocal motor neuropathy varies. Some individuals experience only mild, modest symptoms and require no treatment. For others, treatment generally consists of intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIg) or immunosuppressive therapy with cyclophosphamide.",NINDS,Multifocal Motor Neuropathy
